title: MEAS MAT_SCI 495-0-20 Advanced Special Topics in Material Science

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Thermodynamics and kinetics of ion and electron transport in solids, with emphasis on processes in electrolyte and electrode materials used in energy storage and conversion. Treatment of electroanalytical characterization techniques including a.c. impedance spectroscopy, voltammetry, and d.c. polarization methods. Application areas include fuel cells, electrochemical gas separation membranes, batteries, supercapacitors, and hydrogen storage materials.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value: "Physical Ceramics," by Y.-M. Chiang, D.P. Birnie & D. Kingery; "CRC Handbook of Solid State Electrochemistry," Eds. P.J. Gellings & H.J.M. Bouwmeester; "Physical Chemistry of Ionic Materials: Ions and Electrons in Solids," by Joachim Maier; "Defects in Solids" by Richard J.D. Tilley
